channel.title: Im gonna build my own linux kubuntu PC, from scratch
channel.description:
Yeah, you heard me. My dad is funding me, im gonna go for a amd athlon 64 processcor X2 or intel quad (For everyone who wants me to get it) and ill find out more about motherboards, im also gonna get ATI graphics Driver, im aiming for a 500gb hardrive. Ill be buying a 24" screen and a cool keyboard that has neon blue lights in between the keys which are black. My case is going to match the keyboard.
[s]Im gonna get vista ultimate from a torrent.[/s] Using linux instead
I hope to finish the pc by december, it will be approxamitely 300 GPB cheaper.
Ill keep everyone updated.
I might sell it on Ebay and then make another PC.
Thats all for now.

item.title: Im gonna build my own linux kubuntu PC, from scratch
item.dc:creator: @maru maru
item.description:
@maru wrote:

If you plan to play games on this system, don’t bother with Linux, and just stick with XP.

Read full topic

item.title: Im gonna build my own linux kubuntu PC, from scratch
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:24, topic:133215”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=184473.msg1673931#msg1673931 date=1187110557]
You shouldn’t post in other people’s quotes, but go with Kubuntu. KDE > Gnome.
[/quote]

Ok, 1 question, was the original linux finnish, if so, I should get it instead of vista because im 1/4 finnish.[/quote]

I’m fairly sure there’s a Finnish translation of Kubuntu, try searching(using Finnish, not English) google.

Read full topic

item.title: Im gonna build my own linux kubuntu PC, from scratch
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:20, topic:133215”][quote author=killerman93 link=topic=184473.msg1673756#msg1673756 date=1187103534]

ATI graphics Driver

First mistake. ATI suck.

Im gonna get vista ultimate from a torrent.

Second mistake. Linux is phr33, and better, might I add.

I might sell it on Ebay and then make another PC.

Well, if that is true, Ubuntu might be worth a shot.
Ill try Ubuntu and see whether I like it, my dads already got vista ultimate upgrade, but it only works on 1 pc because its an upgrade :(, but I like vista alot.

Last possible mistake. Ebay is terrible to buy/sell PC’s, and if you sell it with an illegal copy of Vista, you could go to prison.

Yeah but, Linux is buggy as hell.
[/quote]

Buggy? Some linux distros are the most stable things you’ll ever see in your life.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Im gonna build my own linux kubuntu PC, from scratch
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:10, topic:133215”][quote author=bryanc link=topic=184473.msg1672092#msg1672092 date=1187043977]
At least get a Dual core if you don’t have enough for Quad. Amd 64 bit processor sucks without dual or quad.
[/quote]
Tbh, AMD has nothing on Intel anymore. Get a Core 2 Duo or Core 2 Quad.[/quote]
My AMD X2 4600+ runs quite nicely, and at a fraction of the cost of an Intel equivalent.

Read full topic

item.title: Im gonna build my own linux kubuntu PC, from scratch
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:6, topic:133215”]http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16824255001

$400 after rebate. Rated 5 stars (or eggs).[/quote]

Cons: Stand is made of cheap plastic, and wobbles while walking past unless on a very sturdy desk. Controls on the side are not intuitive and make adjustment difficult (although auto-adjust worked just fine for me). There is no DVI input, so users hoping to obtain maximum picture quality from their PC would be advised to buy a DVI/HDMI convert cable, available on this website for about 10 bucks.

Read full topic

Then I would get a SLi ready motherboard and video cards ;\
